title: I need help(Bugsplat)!
body: Hello,I have been playing since 2012.And i have bug splat from time to time,and I was like meh and it fixed it self after a repair.But now days i keep getting it like every day once or twice,i have done everything i found online. And nothing helped me i fell from gold 1 to gold 3 in matters of days, and i get leaver buster bans everyday as well i don't remember the last time i could play without waiting 20 min before.I also wrote to riot support and guess what i got a useless advice that done nothing.I beg for help at this point.

replies.body:
I've got your ticket pulled up and it looks like the agents there are working with you to try and figure out exactly what's causing those bugsplats now. Typically those repairs can help, but if not I'd also suggest using the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) to run a reinstall/clean uninstall to make sure the installation is working correctly. 

If that doesn't work, and since you already have a ticket open, I'd wait for their response and work with them one on one!
